description: Identifier of the account attempting authentication; typically the application or network login ID.
Flag indicating whether the authentication attempt succeeded (e.g., Y/N).
Source IP address of the client that initiated the login request.
Unique identifier for the session established for this authentication event; used to correlate subsequent activity.
Timestamp when the login attempt was recorded; likely stored in UTC; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the authentication event, such as reason, flow, or error details; confirm meaning with SME.
